TopicTitle: How do I report a post?

Articles.Content: Hello! I know that there is the exclamation mark with a ! in it. But, it takes 10 minutes to actually send the report, so I don't know if that is it.
That's an odd bug they haven't been able to stamp out. The report actually goes through, even though it takes quite a while for the display to change. You can also PM a moderator, though.
While we're at it, please remember that when sending a report, you only need to press the button once. It'll still send out. That's all it takes
